chat.lively_danmaku.easter_egg: You find the Easter Egg-Mystia Lorelei,made by armadillo_core_
chat.lively_danmaku.warn.over_danmaku: There are too many danmaku to be shot.This max number can be changed in config
message.lively_danmaku.missing_patchouli: Click here to install Patchouli book
patchouli.lively_danmaku.book.name: Danmaku Guide
patchouli.lively_danmaku.book.landing_te: A mod about more danmaku.(Because of the author's poor English,this part is translated by translation software)
patchouli.lively_danmaku.danmaku_type.de: This is about all kinds of danmaku in this mod
patchouli.lively_danmaku.danmaku_facilit: This is about the different blocks you can use to personalize your danmaku
This is about all weapons to shoot danmaku
patchouli.lively_danmaku.danmaku_extra.d: This is about the extra items in this mod
patchouli.lively_danmaku.big_point.descr: Can be eaten to increase Power value by 0.2, up to 5 points, and can also be used as a consumable material for the Danmaku Workbench
patchouli.lively_danmaku.broomstick.desc: You can ride towards the sky, flying in the same direction as your line of sight
patchouli.lively_danmaku.fumo_table.desc: It's probably an item supply platform, where you can right-click to place the item and then right-click to access it.It is the model of the enchantment stage because in Chinese, fumo sounds the same as enchantment
patchouli.lively_danmaku.reimu_headdress: After wearing it, you gain the ability to fly and squat down to display the judgment point (indicating that the player's collision box becomes smaller), while continuously rendering the Power value in the upper left corner of the screen.
patchouli.lively_danmaku.reimu_item.desc: Hakurei Reimu figurine, approaching will call you to compete for money
patchouli.lively_danmaku.small_point.des: Can be eaten to increase Power value by 0.05, with a maximum of 5 points
patchouli.lively_danmaku.love_color: 恋色マスタースパーク
patchouli.lively_danmaku.love_color.desc: Marisa Kirisame character song can be listened to in a note box
patchouli.lively_danmaku.config.describe: Properties available for configuration: $(br) Maximum number of danmaku fired per shot $(br) danmaku emitter frequency $(br) danmaku import station sampling density
Just a normal danmaku.It can fly straightly without gravity,causing damage proportional to speed
patchouli.lively_danmaku.star_danmaku.de: Just like normal danmaku.It will create a small explosion which power is only 1.
patchouli.lively_danmaku.hakurei_danmaku: It move slowly,but will track the nearest entity after 2 seconds
patchouli.lively_danmaku.hakurei_gohei.d: Shoot danmaku with a certain pattern at once, consuming 0.02 Power points per shot
patchouli.lively_danmaku.sanae_gohei.des: Scan to depict the danmaku pattern, then launch it all at once, with a scanning speed of rounding up the Power value, consuming 0.02 Power value per shot. The default pattern is a five pointed star. $(br2)$(a)Sanae Kochiya teach you to draw stars
patchouli.lively_danmaku.mini_hakkero.de: Launch a certain amount of star danmaku at random angles $(br2)$(6) Danmaku is meant to be gorgeous--Marisa Kirisame
patchouli.lively_danmaku.danmaku_table.d: This is a very ordinary danmaku workbench. You can place Hakurei Gohei in the middle main position, and place large and small P points on the left and right sides, corresponding to the speed value and maximum number of barrage, respectively. Yes, the maximum is 64.

When the quantity is greater than the total number of danmaku on the right side, a single point will fire (quantity value/total number of danmaku) rounded down to the next number of danmaku. If you place more than 64 danmaku comments on the right side, they will be randomly missing during firing. Finally, press the middle button to complete the production.
patchouli.lively_danmaku.advanced_danmak: As the name suggests, it is very advanced. Correspondingly, the main position requires the placement of early seedling imperial coins, with danmaku types (normal/star) and large P dots placed on the left and right sides respectively. On the right side, the default is grid mode, and you can manually draw the danmaku shape, with default continuous strokes.

On the upper right corner of the left interface, there are four buttons: undo the previous operation, switch drawing, switch grid adsorption, and save the pattern in png format. It can also be saved in the danmaku_image folder. You can turn off drawing and then turn it back on to complete the drawing process.
patchouli.lively_danmaku.danmaku_emitter: For players who love explode(:XD). A very simple and easy to understand danmaku launcher, simply place the imperial coins in the launcher to launch the danmaku at a scheduled time. Frequency means how many game moments to launch once. The maximum transmission frequency is 5, as each tick will quickly explode.
You can place the file you want in the danmaku_image folder of the local root directory, and then put in Sanae Gohei. After sampling a certain color of the image, you can form a danmaku point matrix and import it into the Imperial Coin. The bottom four input boxes are the sampling quantity, red, green, and blue

There are two modes - monochrome extraction and color mode. In monochrome extraction mode, you can input a monochrome RGB code to extract specific colors from the image. Color mode samples the entire image as a colored danmaku screen
patchouli.lively_danmaku.danmaku_trace.d: Only Hakurei danmaku can be placed, and custom trace can be given to this advanced self-propelled danmaku
